name: Catch it (itch) (Fiki Abdul Rachman)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Tilt your smartphone screen left-right to move the player, catch fruit as many as possible. if you failed to catch one. Game over.

CREATED BY

Adam Aditya Sugianto
